channel.title: Gpus on S.P.A.M.
channel.description: Recent content in Gpus on S.P.A.M.

item.title: TIL corner turning in GPUs
item.description: (NOTE: this isn’t my best work, and its still kinda WIP, so expect inaccuracies and incomplete parts.) I’ve working my way through Programming Massively Parallel Processors. There’s many interesting bits of knowledge I’ve learned about GPUs, and the bit I want to write down is called ‘corner turning’. It took me a while to wrap my head around it, so I hope this post will serve me well when I need to come back and relearn it at some point in the future.
